title: DJ Sona Red Form VO bugs
body: Currently playing a Sona game using her ultimate skin in red form, everytime she speaks she says the first word of her dialouge then it immediately cuts off. not sure what it is but it only happens in red form

replies.body:
Hey SSG Elmo! Riot Zimberfly is looking into this issue this week. Thanks for the report! ^^

**EDIT**: Should be fixed with 8.7! :)
